unnormalised: Campus hiring remains critical for talent acquisition. We at XYZ Corp are actively recruiting from IIT Delhi and IIM Ahmedabad this year. Dr. Sharma will lead the initiative. We're offering competitive packages, starting at Rs. 10 Lakhs per annum, including benefits and potential relocation assistance for candidates to our Bengaluru campus spanning 50000 sq ft.
normalised: Campus hiring remains critical for talent acquisition. We at X Y Z Corp are actively recruiting from I I T Delhi and I I M Ahmedabad this year. Doctor Sharma will lead the initiative.
